name: Dinosaur Savers
description:
What happen if every cartoon characters drawn in your computer aren't just static pictures and have a story within?

A game created as a tribute for the now discontinued MS Paint, TrexandDrago presents a visual novel starring Tyrano Dragon, Sky Dragon, Angel Dragon and other cartoon dragon characters created since 2010.

Note: This game is not canon to "Dinosaur Savers:Intercept".
